languages.text: "Это... кощунство! В священном склепе должен гореть неугасимый пламень, дабы изгонять тени из места, где упокоились наши достопочтенные мертвецы!"
"Sacrilege! The hallowed crypt must remain illuminated at all times to drive away the shadows from the place of the ancestors' final repose!"
languages.original_text: "Это... кощунство! В священном склепе должен гореть неугасимый пламень, дабы изгонять тени из места, где упокоились наши достопочтенные мертвецы!"

traits.locale_text: "Sacrilege! The hallowed crypt must remain illuminated at all times, to drive away the shadows from the place of the ancestors' final repose!"
"Sacrilege! The hallowed crypt must remain illuminated at all times, to drive away the shadows from the place of the ancestors' final repose!"
"Sacrilege! The hallowed crypt must remain illuminated at all times to drive away the shadows from the place of the ancestors' final repose!"
"Sacrilege! The hallowed crypt must remain illuminated at all times to drive away the shadows from the place of the ancestors' final repose!"
"Sacrilege! The hallowed crypt must remain illuminated at all times to drive away the shadows from the place of the ancestors' final repose!"

languages.text: « Sacrilège ! La crypte sacrée doit être illuminée en permanence pour éloigner les ombres du lieu de repos des ancêtres ! »
languages.original_text: "Sacrilege! The hallowed crypt must remain illuminated at all times to drive away the shadows from the place of the ancestors' final repose!"

traits.locale_text: « Sacrilège ! La crypte sacrée doit être illuminée en permanence pour éloigner les ombres du lieu de repos des ancêtres ! »

languages.text: «¡Sacrilegio! ¡La cripta sagrada debe permanecer iluminada en todo momento para alejar las sombras del lugar de descanso final de los ancestros!».
languages.original_text: "Sacrilege! The hallowed crypt must remain illuminated at all times to drive away the shadows from the place of the ancestors' final repose!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Sacrilegio! ¡La cripta sagrada debe permanecer iluminada en todo momento para alejar las sombras del lugar de descanso final de los ancestros!».

languages.text: “何等亵渎！神圣的墓穴本该时刻保持光明，驱散祖先安息之地的一切阴影！”
languages.original_text: "Sacrilege! The hallowed crypt must remain illuminated at all times to drive away the shadows from the place of the ancestors' final repose!"

traits.locale_text: “何等亵渎！神圣的墓穴本该时刻保持光明，驱散祖先安息之地的一切阴影！”

languages.text: 「冒涜です！神聖な地下室は常に照らされ続け、先祖が最後に眠る場所から影を追い払わなければならない！」
languages.original_text: "Sacrilege! The hallowed crypt must remain illuminated at all times to drive away the shadows from the place of the ancestors' final repose!"

traits.locale_text: 「冒涜です！神聖な地下室は常に照らされ続け、先祖が最後に眠る場所から影を追い払わなければならない！」

languages.text: "Sakrileg! Die geheiligte Krypta muss allzeit erleuchtet sein, um die Schatten aus der letzten Ruhestätte der Ahnen zu verjagen!"
languages.original_text: "Sacrilege! The hallowed crypt must remain illuminated at all times to drive away the shadows from the place of the ancestors' final repose!"

traits.locale_text: "Sakrileg! Die geheiligte Krypta muss allzeit erleuchtet sein, um die Schatten aus der letzten Ruhestätte der Ahnen zu verjagen!"
